name: Unlisted Objects in Editor
description: Adds unlisted objects to the level editor.

activate.name: Activate
activate.description: Activate or deactivate the mod without requiring a restart of Geometry Dash.

doNotInclude.name: Do not include unnecessary ones
doNotInclude.description: Only adds objects that cannot be replicated using listed objects.

separateTab.name: Remove objects from normal tabs
separateTab.description: Chooses where to add the objects.
